basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Sandra Malin Mayfield Endowed Scholarship

description: In memory of Dr. Sandra Malin Mayfield, this scholarship is to retain students who are majoring in English, empower them to persist in their educational goals, and facilitate both the university and its students to succeed in increasing graduation and employment rates. Eligibility Requirements English major Full-time student (12-hour minimum) Available for students experiencing financial challenges impacting their ability to continue their education 2.75 GPA or higher Available to both undergraduate and graduate students
